name: Spicy Tofu Marinade
description: This is inspired by a recipe by Andrea Chesman, who has some wonderful grilling ideas for tofu in her book "The Vegetarian Grill." It makes enough marinade or dipping sauce for a pound of tofu.
keywords: appetizer, dairy-free, healthy, low cholesterol, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, mirin, soy sauce, tofu, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 to 2 garlic cloves, to taste, minced or puréed
1 tablespoon minced or grated fresh ginger
1 teaspoon Asian chili paste or cayenne to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together all of the ingredients in a bowl. Use as a marinade and/or dipping sauce for pan-seared, grilled or plain tofu.
